_pdb_ions.name: _pdb_ions
_pdb_ions.description: Ions recognized by the PDB (e.g. aluminum ion (`AL <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/AL>`_), barium ion (`BA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/BA>`_), calcium ion (`CA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CA>`_), cadmium ion (`CD <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CD>`_), chloride ion (`CL <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CL>`_), cobalt (II) ion (`CO <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CO>`_), cesium ion (`CS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CS>`_), copper (II) ion (`CU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CU>`_), copper (I) ion (`CU1 <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CU1>`_), dinuclear copper ion (`CUA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CUA>`_), mercury (II) ion (`HG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HG>`_), indium (III) ion (`IN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/IN>`_), iodide ion (`IOD <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/IOD>`_), potassium ion (`K <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/K>`_), magnesium ion (`MG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MG>`_), manganese (II) ion (`MN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MN>`_), manganese (III) ion (`MN3 <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MN3>`_), sodium ion (`NA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/NA>`_), lead (II) ion (`PB <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PB>`_), platinum (II) ion (`PT <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PT>`_), rubidium ion (`RB <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/RB>`_), terbium (III) ion (`TB <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TB>`_), thallium (I) ion (`TL <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TL>`_), tungstate(VI) ion (`WO4 <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/WO4>`_), ytterbium (III) ion (`YB <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/YB>`_), zinc ion (`ZN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ZN>`_)).
_pdb_ions.definition: resname AL BA CA CD CL CO CS CU CU1 CUA HG IN IOD K MG MN MN3 NA PB PT RB TB TL WO4 YB ZN

_charmm_ions.name: _charmm_ions
_charmm_ions.description: CHARMM-specific ions: calcium ion (CAL), cesium ion (CES), chloride ion (CLA), potassium ion (POT), sodium ion (SOD), zinc (II) cation (ZN2)
_charmm_ions.definition: resname CAL CES CLA POT SOD ZN2

protein.name: protein
protein.description: All standard and non-standard amino acids (must have a CA atom). See: `ALA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ALA>`_, `ARG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ARG>`_, `ASN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ASN>`_, `ASP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ASP>`_, `CYS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CYS>`_, `GLN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLN>`_, `GLU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLU>`_, `GLY <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLY>`_, `HIS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HIS>`_, `ILE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ILE>`_, `LEU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/LEU>`_, `LYS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/LYS>`_, `MET <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MET>`_, `PHE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PHE>`_, `PRO <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PRO>`_, `SER <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/SER>`_, `THR <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/THR>`_, `TRP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TRP>`_, `TYR <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TYR>`_, `VAL <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/VAL>`_ and non-standard amino acids.

nucleic.name: nucleic
nucleic.description: All nucleobases, nucleotides, and nucleosides. See: `ADE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ADE>`_, `GUN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GUN>`_, `CYT <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CYT>`_, `THY <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/THY>`_, `URA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/URA>`_, `DA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DA>`_, `DC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DC>`_, `DG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DG>`_, `DT <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DT>`_, `DU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DU>`_, `A <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/A>`_, `C <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/C>`_, `G <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/G>`_, `T <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/T>`_, `U <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/U>`_ and more.

dna.name: dna
dna.definition: resname DA DC DG DT DU

rna.name: rna
rna.definition: resname A C G U T

water.name: water
description: - WAT, TIP3, H2O, OH2, TIP, TIP2, TIP4
_Note_: HH0, OHH, and SOL are omitted due to naming conflicts.
water.definition: resname HOH DOD WAT TIP3 H2O OH2 TIP TIP2 TIP4

aminoacid.name: aminoacid
aminoacid.description: A residue with atoms named C, N, CA, and O (typically: `ALA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ALA>`_, `ARG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ARG>`_, `ASN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ASN>`_, ...)
aminoacid.definition: (same residue as name C) and (same residue as name N) and (same residue as name CA) and (same residue as name O)

vmd_nucleic.name: vmd_nucleic
vmd_nucleic.description: A residue with atoms named P, O1P, O2P, and sugar atoms (typically: `DA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DA>`_, `DC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DC>`_, `DG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DG>`_, `DT <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DT>`_, `A <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/A>`_, `C <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/C>`_, `G <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/G>`_, `U <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/U>`_)
vmd_nucleic.definition: (same residue as name P) and (same residue as name O1P) and (same residue as name O2P) and (((same residue as name "C3'") and (same residue as name "C4'") and (same residue as name "C5'") and (same residue as name "O3'") and (same residue as name "O5'")) or ((same residue as name "C3*") and (same residue as name "C4*") and (same residue as name "C5*") and (same residue as name "O3*") and (same residue as name "O5*")))

lipid.name: lipid
lipid.description: Common lipid residue names from PDB and CHARMM: `GPE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GPE>`_, `LPP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/LPP>`_, `OLA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/OLA>`_, `SDS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/SDS>`_, `STE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/STE>`_, `DLPE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DLPE>`_, `DMPC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DMPC>`_, `LPPC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/LPPC>`_, `OLEO <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/OLEO>`_, `PALM <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PALM>`_, `PCGL <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PCGL>`_, `POPC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/POPC>`_, `POPE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/POPE>`_
lipid.definition: resname GPE LPP OLA SDS STE DLPE DMPC LPPC OLEO PALM PCGL POPC POPE

ion.name: ion
ion.description: All PDB and CHARMM ions. See: `_pdb_ions` and `_charmm_ions` above.

glycan.name: glycan
glycan.definition: resname NAG BGLN FUC AFUC MAN AMAN BMA BMAN

drude.name: drude
drude.description: Drude oscillator atom types (LP or DRUD).

solvent.name: solvent
solvent.description: Anything other than protein, sugar, nucleic or lipid.
solvent.definition: not (protein or sugar or nucleic or lipid)

aliphatic.name: aliphatic
aliphatic.definition: resname ALA GLY ILE LEU VAL

hydrophobic.name: hydrophobic
hydrophobic.definition: resname ALA LEU VAL ILE PRO PHE MET TRP

neutral.name: neutral
neutral.definition: resname VAL PHE GLN TYR HIS CYS MET TRP ASX GLX PCA HYP

acyclic.name: acyclic
acyclic.description: Protein residues that are not cyclic.

cyclic.name: cyclic
cyclic.definition: resname HIS PHE PRO TRP TYR

purine.name: purine
purine.definition: resname DA A DG G ADE GUA

pyrimidine.name: pyrimidine
pyrimidine.definition: resname DC C DT T DU U CYT THY URI

ta.name: ta
ta.definition: resname DT T DU U DA A

buried.name: buried
description: Residues that are tipically buried in the protein core
buried.definition: resname ALA CYS ILE LEU MET PHE TRP VAL

surface.name: surface
description: Residues that are tipically exposed on the protein surface
surface.definition: resname ARG ASN ASP GLN GLU GLY HIS LYS PRO SER THR TYR

small.name: small
description: Residues defined for the 'small' flag in ProDy

medium.name: medium
description: Residues defined for the 'medium' flag in ProDy
medium.definition: resname ASN ASP CYS PRO THR VAL ASX PCA HYP

large.name: large
description: Residues defined for the 'large' flag in ProDy
large.definition: resname ARG GLN GLU HIS ILE LEU LYS MET PHE TRP TYR

backbone.name: backbone
description: Residues defined for the 'backbone' flag in ProDy
backbone.definition: (protein and name C CA N O) or (nucleic and name P O1P O2P "C3'" "C4'" "C5'" "O3'" "O5'" "C3*" "C4*" "C5*" "O3*" "O5*")

backbonefull.name: backbonefull
description: Residues defined for the 'backbonefull' flag in ProDy
Atoms: C, CA, H, H1, H2, H3, N, O, OXT
backbonefull.definition: (protein and name C CA H H1 H2 H3 N O OXT)

calpha.name: calpha
description: Ca atoms of :term:`protein` residues, same as selection

helix.name: helix
description: All helix types as defined by DSSP/STRIDE: alpha, 3-10, and pi helix.

sheet.name: sheet
description: All beta sheet types as defined by DSSP/STRIDE: extended and bridge.

coil.name: coil
description: All non-helix, non-sheet secondary structure: coil, turn, bend, and unassigned.
Equivalent to: 'structure C S T' (DSSP) or 'structure C T' (STRIDE)

alpha_helix.name: alpha_helix
description: Alpha helix as defined by DSSP/STRIDE.

pi_helix.name: pi_helix
description: Pi helix as defined by DSSP/STRIDE.

extended_beta.name: extended_beta
description: Extended beta strand as defined by DSSP/STRIDE.

bridge_beta.name: bridge_beta
description: Beta bridge as defined by DSSP/STRIDE.

turn.name: turn
description: Turn as defined by DSSP/STRIDE (hydrogen-bonded turn).

bend.name: bend
description: Bend as defined by DSSP (geometry-based, not in STRIDE).

stdaa.name: stdaa
stdaa.description: The twenty standard amino acid residue names: alanine (`ALA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ALA>`_), arginine (`ARG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ARG>`_), asparagine (`ASN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ASN>`_), aspartic acid (`ASP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ASP>`_), cysteine (`CYS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CYS>`_), glutamine (`GLN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLN>`_), glutamic acid (`GLU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLU>`_), glycine (`GLY <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLY>`_), histidine (`HIS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HIS>`_), isoleucine (`ILE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ILE>`_), leucine (`LEU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/LEU>`_), lysine (`LYS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/LYS>`_), methionine (`MET <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MET>`_), phenylalanine (`PHE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PHE>`_), proline (`PRO <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PRO>`_), serine (`SER <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/SER>`_), threonine (`THR <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/THR>`_), tryptophan (`TRP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TRP>`_), tyrosine (`TYR <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TYR>`_), valine (`VAL <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/VAL>`_).
stdaa.definition: resname ALA ARG ASN ASP CYS GLN GLU GLY HIS ILE LEU LYS MET PHE PRO SER THR TRP TYR VAL

nonstdaa.name: nonstdaa
nonstdaa.description: Common non-standard amino acid residue names: ASP/ASN ambiguous (asparagine or aspartate) (`ASX <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ASX>`_), GLU/GLN ambiguous (glutamine or glutamate) (`GLX <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GLX>`_), S-hydroxycysteine (`CSO <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CSO>`_), cystine (disulfide-linked cysteine) (`CYX <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CYX>`_), ND1-phosphonohistidine (`HIP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HIP>`_), (5-hydroxy-1H-indol-3-yl)acetic acid (`HID <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HID>`_), 4-[6,6-dimethyl-4-oxo-3-(trifluoromethyl)-4,5,6,7-tetrahydro-1H-indazol-1-yl]-2-[(cis-4-hydroxycyclohexyl)amino]benzamide (`HIE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HIE>`_), (1S,2S,3R,6R)-6-amino-4-(hydroxymethyl)cyclohex-4-ene-1,2,3-triol (`HSD <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HSD>`_), L-homoserine (`HSE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HSE>`_), 4-(2-hydroxyphenylsulfinyl)-butylphosphonic acid (`HSP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/HSP>`_), selenomethionine (`MSE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MSE>`_), S,S-(2-hydroxyethyl)thiocysteine (`CME <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CME>`_), selenocysteine (`SEC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/SEC>`_), phosphoserine (`SEP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/SEP>`_), phosphothreonine (`TPO <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TPO>`_), O-phosphotyrosine (`PTR <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PTR>`_), para-hydroxyphenylglycine (`PHD <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/PHD>`_), ambiguous Leu/Ile (`XLE`), (1S,2S)-1-amino-1-(1,3-thiazol-2-yl)propan-2-ol (`XAA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/XAA>`_), N-methyl asparagine (`MEN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/MEN>`_), S-(2-carboxyethyl)cysteine (`CSB <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CSB>`_) , unknown aminoacid (`UNK <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/UNK>`_).
nonstdaa.definition: resname ASX GLX CSO CYX HIP HID HIE HSD HSE HSP MSE CME SEC SEP TPO PTR PHD XLE XAA MEN CSB UNK

nucleobase.name: nucleobase
nucleobase.short: A, G, C, T, U bases
nucleobase.description: Purine and pyrimidine nucleobases (adenine, guanine, cytosine, thymine, uracil): `ADE <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ADE>`_, `GUN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GUN>`_, `CYT <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CYT>`_, `THY <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/THY>`_, `URA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/URA>`_.
nucleobase.definition: resname ADE GUN CYT THY URA

nucleotide.name: nucleotide
nucleotide.description: Mono- and deoxy-nucleotides (A, C, G, T, U variants): `DA <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DA>`_, `DC <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DC>`_, `DG <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DG>`_, `DT <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DT>`_, `DU <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/DU>`_, `A <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/A>`_, `C <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/C>`_, `G <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/G>`_, `T <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/T>`_, `U <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/U>`_.
nucleotide.definition: resname DA DC DG DT DU A C G T U

nucleoside.name: nucleoside
nucleoside.description: All recognized nucleosides and their phosphate derivatives: `ADN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ADN>`_, `AMP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/AMP>`_, `ADP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ADP>`_, `ATP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/ATP>`_, `AGS <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/AGS>`_, `CMP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CMP>`_, `A2P <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/A2P>`_, `A3P <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/A3P>`_, `CTN <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CTN>`_, `C2P <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/C2P>`_, `C3P <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/C3P>`_, `C5P <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/C5P>`_, `CDP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CDP>`_, `CTP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/CTP>`_, `GMP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GMP>`_, `5GP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/5GP>`_, `GDP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GDP>`_, `GTP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/GTP>`_, `THM <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/THM>`_, `TMP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TMP>`_, `TPP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TPP>`_, `TTP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/TTP>`_, `URI <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/URI>`_, `UMP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/UMP>`_, `UDP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/UDP>`_, `UTP <https://www.rcsb.org/ligand/UTP>`_.
nucleoside.definition: resname ADN AMP ADP ATP AGS CMP A2P A3P CTN C2P C3P C5P CDP CTP GMP 5GP GDP GTP THM TMP TPP TTP URI UMP UDP UTP

prody_protein.name: prody_protein
prody_protein.description: All standard and non-standard amino acids (must have a CA atom).
